subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Amar’e Stoudemire did not have a starring role at the Knicks’ preseason media day as he once did. Instead, he answered questions about his knees and his rehabilitation.
snippet: Amar’e Stoudemire did not have a starring role at the Knicks’ preseason media day as he once did. Instead, he answered questions about his knees and his rehabilitation.
